short_description: Led development of enterprise web applications using Vue.js and Node.js. Managed team of 5 developers and implemented CI/CD pipelines improving deployment efficiency by 40%. Architected and deployed microservices infrastructure to enhance system scalability. Mentored junior developers and conducted technical interviews for new hires. Introduced automated testing practices resulting in 60% reduction in production bugs. Successfully delivered 3 major product releases ahead of schedule with zero critical issues.

Introduced automated testing practices resulting in 60% reduction in production bugs. Successfully delivered 3 major product releases ahead of schedule with zero critical issues.
